articles.description: Mozilla's 100th update for Firefox brings a handful of helpful features and new personalization options
articles.content: Mozilla just dropped Firefox version 100, and there are several new features to mark the browsers milestone update including new accessibility options, easier payments, stronger browsing security, an… [+2414 chars]
